fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.formattools

Class HTMLTextExtractor

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.formattools.HTMLTextExtractor

  • public class HTMLTextExtractor
extends Object
    (Strongly) Inspired by: HTML to plain-text. This example program demonstrates the use of jsoup to convert HTML input to lightly-formatted plain-text. That is divergent from the general goal of jsoup's .text() methods, which is to get clean data from a scrape.

    Note that this is a fairly simplistic formatter -- for real world use you'll want to embrace and extend.

    ...
    Author:
    Jonathan Hedley, jonathan@hedley.net
